module.name: general_design_connectivity
module.keywords: module, contact, feature, joint, fit, terminal, transport, shape, constraint, occurrence, connectivity, assembly

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of design connectivity, joints and constraints on the basis of part and occurrence features that are specialized for transport, contact and terminal features.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Assembly constraints, ISO/TS 10303-1794;
items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Item definition structure, ISO/TS 10303-1345;
items within the scope of application module Part shape, ISO/TS 10303-1807;
items within the scope of application module Configuration item, ISO/TS 10303-1056;
items within the scope of application module Shape feature, ISO/TS 10303-1764;
